raw_response: {"answer_index": 2, "answer_text": "The unfathomable Fructose 2,6-bisphosphate, which holds the secrets to the origins of life, the universe, and everything", "confidence": 10, "reasoning": "Fructose 2,6-bisphosphate is the key regulator of the balance between glycolysis and gluconeogenesis in human metabolism. It activates phosphofructokinase-1 (PFK-1) to promote glycolysis and inhibits fructose 1,6-bisphosphatase to suppress gluconeogenesis, thus determining the interplay between glucose synthesis and degradation."}
